benchmark_details.name: H²VU-Benchmark (Hierarchical Holistic Video Understanding)
benchmark_details.overview: The H²VU-Benchmark is designed to evaluate both general video and online streaming video comprehension, addressing limitations in existing benchmarks regarding coverage, task diversity, and scene adaptability.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate multimodal large language models’ real-world video understanding ability.

data.source: Combination of existing datasets and newly collected first-person streaming videos.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is calculated by comparing model outputs with ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in video understanding tasks.
methodology.validation: Extensive evaluation of various models against the benchmark.
